title: 12th Anniversary Reunion Concert
description: A special night with DJ Lee & The Voices of Judah celebrating 12 years of ministry.
summary: Celebrate 12 years of worship with an evening of live praise, testimonies, and special guests in the heart of Chicago.
priceText: Early bird $20 â€¢ At the door $30
priceSummary: Limited early bird tickets available until December 15.

faq.question: What time do doors open?
faq.answer: Doors open at 5:00 PM with pre-show fellowship before the concert begins at 6:00 PM.

faq.question: Is parking available on site?
faq.answer: Yes, complimentary parking is available in the church lot and overflow parking is permitted in the adjacent community center.
